title: Colin Cowherd Podcast- Mike Silver on Brian Flores Lawsuit, Jim Harbaugh's NFL Future, Jimmy G Trade Destinations
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast- Mike Silver on Brian Flores Lawsuit, Jim Harbaugh's NFL Future, Jimmy G Trade Destinations
description:
Colin rants about the "fake news" accusations about Brady's retirement report and why Jim Harbaugh should be interviewing for NFL jobs, then discusses former Oklahoma QB Caleb Williams joining his coach Lincoln Riley at USC (3:00). Then, longtime NFL writer Mike Silver joins Colin to discuss ex-Dolphins head coach Brian Flores' lawsuit against the league (10:00), the history of rocky relationships between owners and head coaches (24:00), the hiring of other minority coaches including Eric Bieniemy (26:00), the latest on Jim Harbaugh's potential move back to the NFL (33:00), the best trade destinations for Jimmy G and the 49ers, and the conversation Mike had with Jimmy after the Niners' loss to the Rams (36:00). 

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
